languages.text: {n}Тембр женщины ломается, переплавляется в голос страдающей мученицы, юной и пылкой.{/n} "Времени почти не осталось. Я слышу, как будущее гремит кулаком в дверь настоящего. Выбирай скорее, кем ты желаешь встретить его приход — слепым рабом ушедшего, верным слугой грядущего или мертвецом".

{n}The woman's voice breaks and shifts to a different pitch and timbre — a martyr's voice, young, fervent, and in pain:{/n} "Time has all but run out. I can hear the fist of the future knocking on the door of the present. Choose quickly what you want to be when it walks in: a blind slave to what is gone, a faithful servant of what is to come, or a corpse."
languages.original_text: {n}Тембр женщины ломается, переплавляется в голос страдающей мученицы, юной и пылкой.{/n} "Времени почти не осталось. Я слышу, как будущее гремит кулаком в дверь настоящего. Выбирай скорее, кем ты желаешь встретить его приход — слепым рабом ушедшего, верным слугой грядущего или мертвецом".

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman's voice breaks and shifts to a different pitch and timbre: a martyr's voice, young, fervent, and in pain.{/n} "Time has all but run out. I can hear the fist of the future bang on the door of the present. Choose quickly who you want to be when it walks in: a blind slave to what is gone, a faithful servant of what is to come, or a dead {mf||wo}man."

I can hear the fist of the future knocking on the door of the present. I can hear the fist of the future knocking on the door of the present. languages.text: {n}Die Stimme der Frau bricht und wechselt in eine höhere Tonlage. Es ist nun die Stimme einer Märtyrerin, jung, leidenschaftlich und voller Schmerz.{/n} "Die Zeit ist schon fast abgelaufen. Ich höre die Faust der Zukunft an die Tür der Gegenwart hämmern. Entscheidet schnell, was Ihr sein möchtet, wenn sie hineinkommt: {mf|ein blinder Sklave des Vergangenen, ein treuer Diener|eine blinde Sklavin des Vergangenen, eine treue Dienerin} des Kommenden oder eine Leiche."
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's voice breaks and shifts to a different pitch and timbre — a martyr's voice, young, fervent, and in pain:{/n} "Time has all but run out. I can hear the fist of the future knocking on the door of the present. Choose quickly what you want to be when it walks in: a blind slave to what is gone, a faithful servant of what is to come, or a corpse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme der Frau bricht und wechselt in eine höhere Tonlage. Es ist nun die Stimme einer Märtyrerin, jung, leidenschaftlich und voller Schmerz.{/n} "Die Zeit ist schon fast abgelaufen. Ich höre die Faust der Zukunft an die Tür der Gegenwart hämmern. Entscheidet schnell, wer Ihr sein möchtet, wenn sie hineinkommt: {mf|ein blinder Sklave des Vergangenen, ein treuer Diener des Kommenden oder ein toter Mann|eine blinde Sklavin des Vergangenen, eine treue Dienerin des Kommenden oder eine tote Frau}."

languages.text: {n}La voix de la femme se brise et prend une nouvelle tonalité : celle d'une martyre, jeune, passionnée... à l'agonie.{/n} « Le temps est écoulé, j'entends déjà le poing qui va frapper à la porte du présent. Choisissez vite ce que vous voulez être quand il entrera : {mf|un|une} esclave aveugle à ce qui n'est plus, {mf|un serviteur|une servante} fidèle de ce qui adviendra... ou un cadavre. »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's voice breaks and shifts to a different pitch and timbre — a martyr's voice, young, fervent, and in pain:{/n} "Time has all but run out. I can hear the fist of the future knocking on the door of the present. Choose quickly what you want to be when it walks in: a blind slave to what is gone, a faithful servant of what is to come, or a corpse."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de la femme se brise et prend une nouvelle tonalité : celle d'une martyre, jeune, passionnée... à l'agonie.{/n} « Le temps est écoulé, j'entends déjà le poing qui va s'abattre sur la porte du présent. Choisissez vite ce que vous voulez être quand il entrera : {mf|un|une} esclave aveugle à ce qui n'est plus, {mf|un serviteur|une servante} fidèle de ce qui adviendra... ou un cadavre. »

languages.text: {n}女人的声音顿了顿，随后以截然不同的嗓音开了口。她的声音年轻、热情而痛苦，宛如一位殉道者。{/n}“时间不多了。我能听到，未来的手正敲打着当下的门扉。终末黎明即将到来，快选择你想成为的人吧！是甘做已逝之物的盲目奴隶？还是成为将来之事的忠实仆人？或者，就此变成死人？”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's voice breaks and shifts to a different pitch and timbre — a martyr's voice, young, fervent, and in pain:{/n} "Time has all but run out. I can hear the fist of the future knocking on the door of the present. Choose quickly what you want to be when it walks in: a blind slave to what is gone, a faithful servant of what is to come, or a corpse."

traits.locale_text: {n}女人的声音顿了顿，随后以截然不同的嗓音开了口。她的声音年轻、热情而痛苦，宛如一位殉道者。{/n}“时间不多了。我能听到，未来的拳头正捶打着当下的门扉。终末黎明即将到来，快选择你想成为的人吧！是甘做已逝之物的盲目奴隶？还是成为将来之事的忠实仆人？或者，就此变成死人？”

languages.text: {n}女の声は途切れて、声の高さも声色も別のものに変わった。若く熱い、そして苦痛に歪む殉教者の声だ。{/n}「もう時間切れだ。未来の手が現在の扉を叩く音が聞こえる。扉が開いたときに誰になりたいのか、すぐに決めるのだ。過ぎ去った者の盲目の奴隷か、これから訪れる者の忠実な従者か、それとも死体になるのか」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's voice breaks and shifts to a different pitch and timbre — a martyr's voice, young, fervent, and in pain:{/n} "Time has all but run out. I can hear the fist of the future knocking on the door of the present. Choose quickly what you want to be when it walks in: a blind slave to what is gone, a faithful servant of what is to come, or a corpse."

traits.locale_text: {n}女の声は途切れて、声の高さも声色も別のものに変わった。若く熱い、そして苦痛に歪む殉教者の声だ。{/n}「もう時間切れだ。未来の手が現在の扉を叩く音が聞こえる。扉が開いたときに誰になりたいのか、すぐに決めるのだ。過ぎ去った者の盲目の奴隷か、これから訪れる者の忠実な従者か、それとも死人になるのか」

languages.text: {n}La voz de la mujer se quiebra y cambia de tono y registro. Ahora es la voz de una mártir, joven, ferviente y dolorida.{/n} «El tiempo casi se ha agotado. Oigo el puño del futuro llamar a la puerta del presente. Elige rápidamente qué quieres ser cuando entre: un esclavo ciego por lo que ha perdido, un{mf||a} sierv{mf|o|a} fiel de lo que está por venir, o un cadáver más».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's voice breaks and shifts to a different pitch and timbre — a martyr's voice, young, fervent, and in pain:{/n} "Time has all but run out. I can hear the fist of the future knocking on the door of the present. Choose quickly what you want to be when it walks in: a blind slave to what is gone, a faithful servant of what is to come, or a corpse."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de la mujer se quiebra y cambia de tono y registro: la voz de una mártir, joven, ferviente y dolorida.{/n} «El tiempo casi se ha agotado. Oigo el puño del futuro golpear la puerta del presente. Elige rápidamente quién quieres ser cuando entre: un esclavo ciego por lo que ha perdido, un siervo fiel de lo que está por venir, o un cadáver más».

languages.text: {n}Kadının sesi çatlayarak tamamen yeni bir perdeye ve tınıya bürünüyor: Genç, tutkulu ve acı içindeki bir şehidin sesi bu.{/n} "Zaman tükendi tükenecek. Gelecek, bir alacaklı misali günümüzün kapısını yumrukluyor. O içeri dalmadan seçimini yap: Ne olacaksın? Mazide kalacağa körü körüne bağlı bir köle mi? Gelmekte olana gönülden bağlı bir hizmetkâr mı? Yoksa ceset mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's voice breaks and shifts to a different pitch and timbre — a martyr's voice, young, fervent, and in pain:{/n} "Time has all but run out. I can hear the fist of the future knocking on the door of the present. Choose quickly what you want to be when it walks in: a blind slave to what is gone, a faithful servant of what is to come, or a corpse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadının sesi çatlayarak tamamen yeni bir tınıya bürünüyor: Genç, tutkulu ve acı içindeki bir şehidin sesi bu.{/n} "Zaman giderek daralıyor. Gelecek, bir alacaklı misali günümüzün kapısını yumrukluyor. Geç olmadan seçimini yap, ne olacaksın? Yitip gidenlere körü körüne bağlı bir köle mi? Gelmekte olana gönülden bağlı bir hizmetkâr mı? Yoksa bir ceset mi?"
